alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 10:49AM CST until January 31 at 8:01AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River near Columbia. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Low areas along the river are inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 18.0 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - - && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Columbia 17.0 13.9 Fri 10 am CS 16.4 17.7 17.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CST.
